message.body: i would smack a baby for a huge bowl of hot mac'n'cheese!
I got no babies handy...sorry charlie
hey. i know you're having a rough night...and i'm sorry about that - and whatever misunderstanding right before you left. i love you. drive carefully...and i'll see you in a little while.
i just checked up on your stick bugs and i think one or both are dead or dying.
Sorry. Squirt water on them with a bottle. No pick up Q. Sorry so late. I spaced.
